content: abc-clown from andrea gaida akinnastisu for ravelry change to blue in last st of 7 r 8 single_crochet in next 7 sts 2 single_crochet in next st 2 times = 18 r 9 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 2 sts repeat = 24 r 10 single_crochet in next 2 sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 3 sts 5 times 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st = 30 r 11 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 4 sts repeat = 36 fasten_off leaving long end for sewing bow working in red part 1 chain 70 fasten_off part 2 chain 2 r 1 6 single_crochet in second chain from hook = 6 r 2 2 single_crochet in each st around = 12 r 3 4 single_crochet in each st around = 12 r 5 2 st with single_crochet decrease around = 6 r 6 single_crochet in each st around = 6 r 7 2 single_crochet in each st around = 12 r 8 9 single_crochet in each st around = 12 r 10 2 st with single_crochet decrease around = 6 fasten_off pull end of thread through last 6 sts and sew closely sew bow to chain and fix it with double knot on the little clown s neck hair cut 8 pieces of approx 10 cm length and knot on upper head as follows fold 2 strands of yarn in the middle draw them through a st take loose ends and pull them through loop cut hair and if desired split the yarn in its single strands you should fix hair on top of head so that you will not see the knots when the cap is on head sew cap on had pointing a little sidewards -
